data.title: Dive into anything
data.text:
Hello

Thanks in advance for any assistance. I am casting using a Galaxy A21 Android. I’m casting to an Onn Chromecast.

The problem is that whatever I cast to my TV, is broadcast out to let my daughter know what I’m watching. It displays the title and who is watching.

This is very annoying for both of us. Why is this happening and how do I fix it?

Thanks again.

John
